评论详情: My friend fits the small, but I have not seen her in them yet. Although, she and my younger brother are both pretty skinny, so I used him as a model for the pants. That was the main thing I was looking for.  The stars are really cute, and the waistband has an elastic part on the back to help fit. I'm glad with my purchase
